title:
Global Strong Solutions to the Cauchy Problem of Three-dimensional
  Isentropic Magnetohydrodynamics Equations with Large Initial Data
authors: Yachun Li, Peng Lu, Zhaoyang Shang
abstract:
We consider the Cauchy problem to the three-dimensional isentropic
compressible Magnetohydrodynamics (MHD) system with density-dependent
viscosities. When the initial density is linearly equivalent to a large
constant state, we prove that strong solutions exist globally in time, and
there is no restriction on the size of the initial velocity and initial
magnetic field.
